name: Bao and Bing's
description:
Bao and Bing's: a short and sweet shaved ice shop simulation!

By Chase D. and Zilin Z.

Instructions:

1. This is a MOUSE ONLY game!
2. Press BEGIN to begin!
3. Open the store by clicking on the OPEN sign. 
4. When the customer appears, attempt to take her order. 
5. While in the kitchen, click and drag ice cubes to the shaved ice machine and press the READY button to prepare the ice. 
6. When you turn on the ice machine, use your mouse to keep the machine from falling from the table. 
7. Refer to the ingredient book and prepare the ice. 
8. Serve the ice.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
